nodes.text: The S7-H7 Slicing Droid was a model of slicer droid that saw use during the Cold War. A number of S7-H7 droids worked with BB-22 Salvage Droids and JT-65 Salvage Droids in the Barasin Refuse Yards on the planet Balmorra.
S7-H7 Slicing Droids appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Barasin Refuse Yards in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
